# ngx-doughnut-chart

`ngx-doughnut-chart` is a light weight with no dependencies angular component to draw donut charts using svgs.

## Installation

All you need to do is to run the following command:

```bash
$ npm i ngx-doughnut-chart --save
```
or
```bash
$ yarn add ngx-doughnut-chart --save
```

## Usage

Import NgxDonutChartModule module into your main module
and add it to imports:

```typescript
import { BrowserModule } from '@angular/platform-browser';
import { NgModule } from '@angular/core';

import { AppComponent } from './app.component';

import { NgxDonutChartModule } from 'ngx-doughnut-chart';

@NgModule({
  declarations: [
    AppComponent
  ],
  imports: [
    BrowserModule,
    NgxDonutChartModule
  ],
  providers: [],
  bootstrap: [AppComponent]
})
export class AppModule { }
...

Pass data like this:

```typescript

donutChartData = [
  {
    label: 'Liverpool FC',
    value: 5,
    color: 'red',
  },
  {
    label: 'Real Madrid	',
    value: 13,
    color: 'black',
  },
  {
    label: 'FC Bayern München',
    value: 5,
    color: 'blue',
  },
];

```

and then use the component in your html like:

```html
<ngx-donut-chart
  [data]="donutChartData"
  [title]="'Sessions'"
  [radius]="88"
  [thickness]="10"
  [margin]="30">
</ngx-donut-chart>
```
